verse: यथा त्वं च तथाऽहं च भेदो हि नावयोर्ध्रुवम् । यथा क्षीरे च धावल्यं यथाऽग्नौ दाहिका सति
meaning: Meaning:Just as you and I are not distinctly different, so is the case with whiteness in milk and burning in fire. In both instances, there is an inherent connection or similarity between the two elements.
